noun.description: The state of being strong enough to withstand adverse conditions or rough handling.
The ability to deal with hardship or to cope in difficult situations.
examples: they showed great mental toughness to keep going

noun.description: Demonstration of a strict and uncompromising approach.
examples: the toughness of the regime was legendary

noun.description: The quality of being strong and prone to violence.
examples: his reputation for toughness on the street
they were known to file their teeth to show their toughness
